title: Renew a Player's Contract
description: A key player's contract is expiring at the end of the season. The GM needs to negotiate and process a contract extension.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player's current contract details and recent performance data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary background information.

tasks.description: Based on performance and market value, generate a competitive contract extension offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a 4-year contract extension with a specified salary.

tasks.description: Send the offer to the player's agent for negotiation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent formally sends the contract offer.

tasks.description: Once agreed upon, generate the final contract for signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the final legal document.
